channel.title: Comments on: Family-Integrated Church 1: The “Family-Integrated Church Movement” Is Publishing!

item.title: By: Dennis Gundersen
item.dc:creator: Dennis Gundersen
item.description: Sam, I agree with Bob G's assessment that you are one of the clearest thinkers I know of, applying sound and Biblical reasoning to questions that arise. I appreciate you taking on this issue, and will seek to remember to pray for you, as you have stepped into a mine field among people who I have found will often be vehement in their opposition and will insist that only their view of the church is right, while building it on scanty proof-texts and poor hermeneutics. Blessings to you in your work,for helping to define a broadly Biblical definition of the church that does not improperly bind men's consciences. -- Dennis Gundersen
item.content:encoded:
Sam,
I agree with Bob G’s assessment that you are one of the clearest thinkers I know of, applying sound and Biblical reasoning to questions that arise. I appreciate you taking on this issue, and will seek to remember to pray for you, as you have stepped into a mine field among people who I have found will often be vehement in their opposition and will insist that only their view of the church is right, while building it on scanty proof-texts and poor hermeneutics. Blessings to you in your work,for helping to define a broadly Biblical definition of the church that does not improperly bind men’s consciences. — Dennis Gundersen
